hypothesis_content.title: Bull-to-Neutral Transition on Momentum Exhaustion & Volume Decline
hypothesis_content.statement: In BULL regimes, when BTC price makes 3+ consecutive higher highs but with declining volume (each high on <90% of previous high's volume) and daily RSI(14) shows bearish divergence (price higher high, RSI lower high), the regime will transition to NEUTRAL within 4 days with >75% probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Momentum exhaustion patterns with volume decline and RSI divergence are classic technical signs of trend weakening. Combined with euphoric sentiment, they often precede consolidation periods.
entry_conditions: BTC makes 3+ consecutive higher highs over 5 days
Each successive high occurs on lower volume (<90% of previous high's volume)
RSI(14) shows bearish divergence (lower high on price's higher high)
Social sentiment extreme (Crypto Social Volume >2.0 standard deviations above mean)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Regime shifts to NEUTRAL (confidence >60%) OR BTC price corrects 5% from recent high
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Volume expands on next high OR regime remains BULL for 7+ days after signal

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 30% of such exhaustion patterns lead to continued BULL regime for 10+ days without NEUTRAL transition.
